item.title: Spark DataFrame : two ways to count the number of rows per partition
item.description: Sometimes, we are required to compute the number of rows per each partition of a Spark DataFrame. In order to achieve this, there are two different ways : The first and the more straightforward way is using Dataframe.mapPartitions(). The second way is using the spark_partition_id() function, followed by a grouping count aggregation.
